title: Cant install hardhat with npm on new Windows 11
body:
### Version of Hardhat

2.13.0

### What happened?

Hello, 

Thank you for your attention.
Usually i havent problem to install hardhat in a folder. 
I did an update of Windows 11 yesterday night : 22621.1413 

I still can install others dependencies (like express).
But this morning i did (on windows power shell or git bash) :
npm install hardhat 
and I had this issue :  
```

npm ERR! code 1
npm ERR! path D:\blockchain\learn\web3-junior\block\node_modules\c-kzg
npm ERR! command failed
npm ERR! command C:\WINDOWS\system32\cmd.exe /d /s /c node-gyp rebuild
npm ERR! Warning: Missing input files:
npm ERR! D:\blockchain\learn\web3-junior\block\node_modules\c-kzg\libblst.a
npm ERR! D:\blockchain\learn\web3-junior\block\node_modules\c-kzg\build\..\build\Release\kzg.node
npm ERR! Les projets sont générés individuellement dans cette solution. Pour activer la génération en parallèle, ajoutez le commutateur "-m".
npm ERR!   nothing.c
npm ERR!   win_delay_load_hook.cc
npm ERR!   nothing.vcxproj -> D:\blockchain\learn\web3-junior\block\node_modules\c-kzg\build\Release\\nothing.lib
npm ERR!   build_blst
npm ERR!   build_ckzg
npm ERR!   'cc' n'est pas reconnu en tant que commande interne
npm ERR!   ou externe, un programme exécutable ou un fichier de commandes.
npm ERR! C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\Community\MSBuild\Microsoft\VC\v160\Microsoft.CppCommon.targets(241,5): error MSB8066: la build personnalisée de 'D:\blockchain\ck\node_modules\c-kzg\dist\deps\blst\build.sh;D:\blockchain\learn\web3-junior\block\node_modules\c-kzg\dist\deps\c-kzg\c_kzg_4844.c' s'est arrêtée. Code 1. [D:\blockchain\learn\web3-junior\kzg\build\kzg.vcxproj]
npm ERR! gyp info it worked if it ends with ok
npm ERR! gyp info using node-gyp@9.1.0
npm ERR! gyp info using node@16.18.0 | win32 | x64
npm ERR! gyp info find Python using Python version 3.10.8 found at "C:\Python310\python.exe"
npm ERR! gyp info find VS using VS2019 (16.11.32413.511) found at:
npm ERR! gyp info find VS "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\Community"
npm ERR! gyp info find VS run with --verbose for detailed information
npm ERR! gyp info spawn C:\Python310\python.exe
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args [
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'C:\\programs\\node\\node_modules\\npm\\node_modules\\node-gyp\\gyp\\gyp_main.py',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'binding.gyp',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-f',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'msvs',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-I',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'D:\\blockchain\\learn\\web3-junior\\block\\node_modules\\c-kzg\\build\\config.gypi',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-I',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'C:\\programs\\node\\node_modules\\npm\\node_modules\\node-gyp\\addon.gypi',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-I',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'C:\\Users\\chamo\\AppData\\Local\\node-gyp\\Cache\\16.18.0\\include\\node\\common.gypi',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dlibrary=shared_library',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dvisibility=default',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dnode_root_dir=C:\\Users\\chamo\\AppData\\Local\\node-gyp\\Cache\\16.18.0',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dnode_gyp_dir=C:\\programs\\node\\node_modules\\npm\\node_modules\\node-gyp',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dnode_lib_file=C:\\\\Users\\\\chamo\\\\AppData\\\\Local\\\\node-gyp\\\\Cache\\\\16.18.0\\\\<(target_arch)\\\\node.lib',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dmodule_root_dir=D:\\blockchain\\learn\\web3-junior\\block\\node_modules\\c-kzg',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Dnode_engine=v8',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '--depth=.',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '--no-parallel',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '--generator-output',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'D:\\blockchain\\learn\\web3-junior\\block\\node_modules\\c-kzg\\build',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '-Goutput_dir=.'
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args ]
npm ERR! gyp info spawn C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\Community\MSBuild\Current\Bin\MSBuild.exe
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args [
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   'build/binding.sln',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '/clp:Verbosity=minimal',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '/nologo',
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args   '/p:Configuration=Release;Platform=x64'
npm ERR! gyp info spawn args ]
npm ERR! gyp ERR! build error
npm ERR! gyp ERR! stack Error: `C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\Community\MSBuild\Current\Bin\MSBuild.exe` failed with exit code: 1
npm ERR! gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.onExit (C:\programs\node\node_modules\npm\node_modules\node-gyp\lib\build.js:201:23)
npm ERR! gyp ERR! stack     at ChildProcess.emit (node:events:513:28)
npm ERR! gyp ERR! stack     at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (node:internal/child_process:293:12)
npm ERR! gyp ERR! System Windows_NT 10.0.22621
npm ERR! gyp ERR! command "C:\\programs\\node\\node.exe" "C:\\programs\\node\\node_modules\\npm\\node_modules\\node-gyp\\bin\\node-gyp.js" "rebuild"
npm ERR! gyp ERR! cwd D:\blockchain\learn\web3-junior\block\node_modules\c-kzg
npm ERR! gyp ERR! node -v v16.18.0
npm ERR! gyp ERR! node-gyp -v v9.1.0
npm ERR! gyp ERR! not ok

```

### Minimal reproduction steps

on Windows 11 :
npm install hardhat

### Search terms

hardhat install windows
Finally, it works today after restarting my computer...
